Package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.service

Class RestService

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.api.service.RestService
@Service @Scope("prototype") public class RestService extends Object
Handles API request execution and response validation.

This service provides methods to execute API requests, validate responses, and manage authentication. It integrates with RestClient for request execution and RestResponseValidator for validation.

Author:

    • RestService

      public RestService(RestClient restClient, RestResponseValidator restResponseValidator, boolean cacheAuthentication)
      Constructs a new RestService instance with caching configuration.
      Parameters:
      restClient - The client responsible for executing API requests.
      restResponseValidator - The validator for API responses.
      cacheAuthentication - Whether authentication should be cached.

    • validate

      public <T> List<io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.AssertionResult<T>> validate(io.restassured.response.Response response, io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.Assertion... assertions)
      Validates a response against the provided assertions.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the assertion results.
      Parameters:
      response - The response to validate.
      assertions - The assertions to apply.
      Returns:
      A list of assertion results.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the response or assertions are null.

    • authenticate

      public void authenticate(String username, String password, Class<? extends BaseAuthenticationClient> authenticationClientClass)
      Authenticates a user using a specified authentication client.
      Parameters:
      username - The username for authentication.
      password - The password for authentication.
      authenticationClientClass - The authentication client class to use.
      Throws:
      RestServiceException - if authentication fails.
